package.name: Math_Polynomial
package.summary: Package to represent and manipulate Polynomial equations
package.description:
The class Math_Polynomial represents Polynomial equations built from strings or from other Polynomial objects and offers some basic information about each Polynomial equation.
The Math_PolynomialOp class defines operations on Math_Polynomial objects such as add, multiply, divide, etc.
